metadata.title: CVE-2023-6176 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - high
metadata.description:
A null pointer dereference flaw was found in the Linux kernel API for thecryptographic algorithm scatterwalk functionality. This issue occurs when auser constructs a malicious packet with specific socket configuration,which could allow a local user to crash the system or escalate theirprivileges on the system.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6176` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.19.0-21-generic - 6.2.0-41.42
linux-image-5.19.0-21-generic-lpae - 6.2.0-41.42
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-21-generic - 6.2.0-41.42
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-21-generic-64k - 6.2.0-41.42
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-gcp - 6.2.0-1022.24
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1007-lowlatency - 6.2.0-1020.20
linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1007-lowlatency-64k - 6.2.0-1020.20
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-5.19.0-1008-oracle - 6.2.0-1019.20
No subscription required

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.2.0-41.42').
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-azure package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-gcp package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.2.0-1022.24').
linux-ibm: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of kernel support, was needs-triage').
linux-lowlatency package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.2.0-1020.20').
linux-oracle package in lunar is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.2.0-1019.20').
linux-raspi package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
linux-starfive package in lunar is affected and needs fixing.
